Item.Risk_Statement: Inadequate session limit mechanisms may expose sensitive information or operating systems to unauthorized access.
Item.Description: The information system automatically terminates a user session after [Assignment: organization-defined conditions or trigger events requiring session disconnect].
Item.Example: Users account are logged out have a defined period.
Item.Testing_Procedures: Obtain documents relating to security safeguards and ascertain if the information system automatically terminates a user session when trigger events or conditions are met (such as organization-defined periods of user inactivity, targeted responses to certain types of incidents, time-of-day restrictions on information system use).
